Name: Basil & Honey Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: STIR honey and lime juice in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Basil adds dry vegetal notes to a Canch√†nchara (honey) Daiquiri .
History: Created in 2005 by yours truly in London, England.
